welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vanzago, Italy! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful city, known for its stunning architecture and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Vanzago has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
